  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Entities.Entity

extends java.lang.Object

      • checkTraversable

        public boolean checkTraversable(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> cells,
                                int x,
                                int y)
        Mainly used for the enemy classes and it checks if a certain cell is a ground cell.
        Parameters:
        cells - The map of the level as a 2D ArrayList.
        x - The x value of the co-ordinate that is being checked.
        y - The y value of the co-ordinate that is being checked.
        Returns:
        True if the cell is a ground cell, false if it's any other type of cell.
